description.english: We had to put a mine under him...
description.german: Wir mussten ihm eine Mine unterschieben ...
description.french: On a dû le mettre sur une mine...
description.italian: Abbiamo dovuto piazzargli una mina sotto...
description.koreana: 녀석의 발 밑에 지뢰를 묻었어야 했는데...
description.spanish: Tuvimos que colocarle una mina debajo...
description.schinese: 只能在他脚下埋了颗地雷……
description.tchinese: 我們得在他腳下塞顆地雷……
description.russian: Все-таки надо было мину под него ставить…
description.japanese: 彼の足下に地雷を埋めなければならなかった…
description.polish: Trzeba było podłożyć pod niego minę...
description.brazilian: Tivemos que colocar uma mina debaixo dele...

displayName.koreana: 어떻게 이런 일이 일어날 수 있죠?!
displayName.japanese: どうしてこんなことに！？

description.italian: I bambini crescono così in fretta
description.japanese: 子どもの成長はあっという間

description.english: Experience the real fury of cats!
description.german: Erlebe die wahre Wut der Katzen!
description.italian: Prova la vera furia dei gatti!
description.spanish: ¡Sufre la verdadera furia de los gatos!
description.tchinese: 讓貓貓學習經驗成為真正的毛小孩！
description.japanese: 猫の本気の怒りを体験しよう！
液体クリプトニャイト

description.english: Thumbs up to you, you are playing such a cool game, well done!
description.german: Daumen hoch für dich, du spielst so ein cooles Spiel, gut gemacht!
description.french: Bravo ! Vous faites carton plein, bien joué !
description.italian: Complimenti, stai giocando a un gioco fantastico, ben fatto!
description.spanish: Bravo, estás que te sales. ¡Te felicito!
description.tchinese: 給你一個讚！你的遊戲打得真棒，幹得好！
description.russian: Ну ты просто красавчик, играешь в такую классную игру, тупо молодец!
description.japanese: 君に拍手をおくろう、すばらしいゲームプレイだ、よくやったね！
description.polish: Brawa dla ciebie, grasz w świetną grę, oby tak dalej!
description.brazilian: Que bom pra você, tá jogando um jogo tão legal, mandou bem!

description.english: One more touch and off with your finger
description.german: Fass mich nochmal an und der Finger ist ab
description.french: Tu me touches encore une fois, t'as plus de doigts.
description.italian: Toccami di nuovo e non avrai più il dito
description.spanish: Como toques otra vez, despídete del dedo.
description.tchinese: 碰牠一下，就準備跟你的手指說掰掰囉
description.russian: Еще раз тыкнешь - останешься без пальца :)
description.japanese: もう一度触れたら指がなくなる
description.polish: Jeszcze raz go dotkniesz, a stracisz palec

description.english: We gave him a good beating, that's for sure!
description.german: Wir haben im gut eins mitgegeben, das ist mal sicher!
description.french: On l'a bien amoché, c'est certain !
description.italian: Gli abbiamo dato una bella batosta, questo è sicuro!
description.spanish: Le hemos dado una buena tunda, sí, señor.
description.schinese: 我们结结实实揍了他一顿！
description.tchinese: 我們肯定給它來了一趟精美的按摩服務！
description.russian: Ну и намылили мы ему кости конечно!
description.japanese: いい殴りっぷりだったよ、本当に！

description.english: You are so cool that the tower exploded!
description.german: Du bist so cool, dass der Turm explodiert ist.!
description.french: Vous êtes tellement cool que la tour a explosé !
description.italian: Sei talmente forte che la torre è esplosa!
description.spanish: ¡Molas tanto que la torre ha explotado!
description.schinese: 你太厉害了，那座猫塔都炸了！
description.tchinese: 你把那砲塔炸掉的時候真是太酷了！
description.russian: Ты такой крутой, что срывает башню!
description.japanese: すごいよ、タワーが爆発した！
description.polish: Jesteś tak super, że aż wieża eksplodowała!
description.brazilian: Foi tão irado a torre explodindo!

description.english: I hope that after this, there won't be any Roosters
description.german: Ich hoffe, dass hier danach keine Gockel mehr sind
description.french: J'espère qu'après ça, il n'y aura plus de coqs.
description.italian: Speriamo che d'ora in poi non ci saranno altri galli!
description.koreana: 이후에는 두번 다시 어둠이 찾아오지 않길 바랍니다
description.spanish: Espero que no salgan más gallos después de esto.
description.schinese: 希望以后不会再出现公鸡了
description.tchinese: 希望自此以後，世上再也沒有公雞
description.japanese: この後はもう、おんどりが来ないことを願う
description.polish: Mam nadzieję, że potem nie będzie już żadnych kogutów
description.brazilian: Espero que após isso não tenha mais Galos

displayName.english: The old lady is not on our tail anymore
displayName.german: Die alte Lady klebt uns nicht mehr am Hintern
displayName.french: La vieille dame ne nous traque plus
displayName.italian: La vecchia signora non è più alle nostre calcagna
displayName.koreana: 그 노파는 더이상 우리를 뒤쫓지 않아
displayName.spanish: La vieja ya no nos pisa los talones
displayName.schinese: 老女人不会再来骚扰我们了
displayName.tchinese: 那個老女人再也不會追著我們不放了
displayName.japanese: あの老婆はもうこっちを尾行してない
displayName.polish: Starsza pani nie siedzi nam już na ogonie
displayName.brazilian: A velhinha não está mais no nosso rabo

description.english: Time to take care of your retirement plan
description.german: Zeit, dich um deinen Ruhestand zu kümmern
description.french: L'heure de la retraite a sonné.
description.italian: È ora di occuparsi del proprio piano pensionistico.
description.spanish: Ve buscándote un plan de jubilación.
description.schinese: 该去计划退休之后的生活了
description.tchinese: 你也是時候準備你的退休計畫了
description.japanese: 引退の予定を考える時期がきた

displayName.german: Ich bin aquatisch, ich bin wild!
displayName.japanese: 吾輩は水中を生きる野生生物である！

description.english: Nobody wants to deal with him now. That's a shame...
description.german: Jetzt will keiner mehr mit ihm zu tun haben. Was für eine Schande ...
description.french: Personne ne veut plus avoir affaire à lui. Quel dommage...
description.italian: Nessuno vuole avere più a che fare con lui. È un peccato...
description.koreana: 지금 당장은 누구도 녀석과 친해지려고 하지 않아. 정말 유감이야...
description.spanish: Nadie quiere tratos con él. Lástima...
description.schinese: 现在谁都不想理它了，可惜……
description.tchinese: 現在再也沒有人想要理它了，下夕下井……
description.russian: Больше никто не водится с ним. Эх, какая жалость….. (Отомстили за Котаник) ( И Белого Волка не пришлось звать)
description.japanese: 誰も今の彼には関わりたくない。残念だ…
description.polish: Nikt nie chce się nim teraz zająć. Jaka szkoda...
description.brazilian: Ninguém quer lidar com ele agora. Que pena...

description.french: Toutes les épices sont à nous !
description.tchinese: 所有的香料都是我們的啦！
description.russian: Все специи наши! (Как думаете, вобла на такого нормально клевать будет?)
description.japanese: すべてのスパイスは我々のものだ！

displayName.english: The Steel Frame is a bad guy!
displayName.german: Der Stahlrahmen ist ein böser Junge!
displayName.japanese: スチールフレームは悪いやつだ！

description.english: How much does a kilogram of scrap metal cost today?
description.german: Was kostet das Kilo Metallschrott heute?
description.french: Combien coûte un kilo de métal ?
description.italian: Quanto costa oggigiorno un chilo di rottami metallici?
description.koreana: 오늘의 kg당 고철 가격은 얼마나 하지?
description.spanish: ¿A cuánto está el kilo de chatarra hoy día?
description.schinese: 今天一公斤废铁多少钱？
description.tchinese: 今天廢鐵一公斤多少錢啊？
description.japanese: 最近だと金属くずは1キロあたりいくらするんだろう？
description.brazilian: Quanto custa um quilo de ferragem hoje em dia?

displayName.english: Did you finish watching the credits?
displayName.german: Hast du dir die Credits zuende angesehen?
displayName.italian: Hai finito di guardare i titoli di coda?
displayName.schinese: 制作人员名单看完了吗？
displayName.tchinese: 你把製作人員名單看完了嗎？
displayName.japanese: クレジットはもう見た？

description.english: It's not as difficult as it seems.
description.german: Es ist nicht so schwer, wie man denkt.
description.french: C'est pas aussi dur que ça en a l'air.
description.italian: Non è così difficile come sembra.
description.spanish: No es tan difícil como parece.
description.tchinese: 這其實沒有看上去那麼困難。
description.russian: Это не так сложно, как кажется.
description.japanese: 思ってるほど難しいことじゃないよ。
description.brazilian: Não é tão difícil quanto parece.

description.french: Il a fait de son mieux !
description.spanish: Ha hecho lo que ha podido.
description.japanese: 彼は最善を尽くしたんだ！
description.brazilian: Ele fez o melhor que pode!
